text:
AsPlugout is a ~TiddlyWiki plugin to configure and create plugins consisting mainly of shadow content tiddlers. To install, just drag the following link to your ~TiddlyWiki:

[[$:/plugins/chris2fr/asplugout]]

More info at the plugin pages [[readme|$:/plugins/chris2fr/asplugout/readme]], [[usage|$:/plugins/chris2fr/asplugout/usage]], and [[config|$:/plugins/chris2fr/asplugout/config]].

The repository page is here:

https://github.com/chris2fr/tiddlywiki-as-plugin
creator: Christopher Mann <christopher@mann.fr>
title: AsPlugout
